column2: This decision will hide the society clothes whenever they are supposed to be displayed. Warning : It might take time to have the portrait updated.
This decision will show the society clothes whenever they are supposed to be displayed. Warning : It might take time to have the portrait updated.
This decision will hide the headgear whenever they are supposed to be displayed. Warning : It might take time to have the portrait updated.
This decision will show the headgear whenever they are supposed to be displayed. Warning : It might take time to have the portrait updated.
